alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Converse County Lower Elevations; Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 28 at 1:51PM MST until February 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations, Niobrara County, Goshen County, Laramie Valley, South Laramie Range, South Laramie Range Foothills, Central Laramie County and East Laramie County. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Any areas that still have existing snowpack will experience areas of blowing and drifting snow that will create poor visibility and slick roads that will further make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 MPH or gusts of 58 MPH or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Converse County Lower Elevations; Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
